inclusion.criterion: Patients with an asymptomatic stenosis >80% (NASCET) with a documented progression of the degree of stenosis to >80% within 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Neurologist´s explicit consent to potentially perform CAS
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Underlying disease other than atherosclerosis (inflammatory or autoimmune disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He is physically active, but his LDL-C level is high.
